title: Sine and Cosine - coordinates on a circle

content.question: ​In the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane, an angle in standard position measures <math alttext="fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> radians. A circle centered at the origin has radius <math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What are the coordinates of the point of intersection of the terminal ray of the angle and the circle?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 2 square root of 3 comma 2 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses negative fraction numerator square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction comma 1 half close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses fraction numerator square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction comma 1 half close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses 2 square root of 3 comma 2 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 2 square root of 3 comma 2 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
